"Sky Hoppers/Sky Chargers":
"Sky Hoppers/Sky Chargers make your character jump when you touch them.

This does not consume your regular jumps, so you will be able to jump again after using them.

Once a Sky Hopper/Sky Charger has been used, it will become unusable for a short time."
"<yellow>During a Sky Charger jump,<c> using a Dive Attack will also perform <yellow>a powerful additional attack<c>."
